venue.name: Regatta Room at the Regatta Room and Banquet Center

item.description:
Enjoy a dessert buffet (featuring dozens of desserts from restaurants and bakeries) and a chance to bid on over 100 auction items. All proceeds benefit animals of the Cocheco Valley Humane Society, a no-kill animal shelter.

The auction items range from under $25 to priceless, and include animal-related things, restaurant gift certificates, theater tickets, sporting events, spas, art, and more **

We'll all be sitting at the same (large) table, where we can socialize, enjoy eating our desserts, and use it as our take-off point for when we stroll around looking at auction items.

The event is taking place in Eliot Maine, which is only 5 MINUTES from Portsmouth NH.

Please RSVP only if you ARE going.

Tickets cost $25 in advance, or $30 at the door. To buy a ticket in advance go to cvhsonLine.org or call (603) 749-5322, extension 112.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a MeetUp sign on a table.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dessert tasting / Auction to Help Animals
